label: Professional Responsibility
description: Problem course analyzing ethical issues that arise in the practice of law and considering the approaches to such issues taken by the American Bar Association's Code of Professional Responsibility, Model Rules of Professional Conduct, and Code of Judicial Conduct. 2 to 4 graduate hours. 2 to 3 professional hours.
courseSectionInformation: 2 to 4 graduate hours. 2 to 3 professional hours.
sectionDeptRestriction: Restricted to students in the Law department.
